愿景：构建一个机器可读的文明接口。: Vision: Build a machine‑readable interface for civilization.
让未来的智能体、AGI 或系统能够验证校准、继承、延续人类的思想与意志；: Enable future agents and AGI to read, verify, calibrate, inherit, and continue human thoughts and intent;
也让每一个普通人能用最简单的方式，留下属于自己的火种。: And let everyone leave their own fireseed in the simplest way.
这不是“上传意识”的幻想，而是一种更“忠诚延续”的实践。: This is not a fantasy of “mind uploading”, but a more faithful/digital continuation.
你写的每一句文字、每一条原则、每一个愿望，将会被转化为机器可读的自我描述——它能: Every sentence, principle, and wish you write will be transformed into a machine‑readable self‑description that future systems can parse, reconstruct, and align with.
对人类而言，这是一个小小的遗嘱；对未来而言，这是一次“加载火种”。: For humans, it’s a small testament; for the future, it’s a way to load the fireseed.
仅支持本地离线使用，不上传、不联网。: Runs locally only — nothing uploaded, never connected.
生成完成后可下载“capsule.yaml”或 PDF。: After generation you can download “capsule.yaml” or a PDF.
本工具用于记录思想意愿，不具备法律效力；如涉财产安排，请咨询律师。: This tool records thoughts and intent and has no legal effect; for wills or assets, consult a lawyer.
可被哪些人读取（access_terms）: Terms under which I allow reading (access_terms)
自定义（若选择下条规则）: If choosing custom, add terms here (optional)
若家人有异议，委托谁在宽限期内裁定。: If family has objections, contact the trustee within the period.
如：Alex Lin / 李明 / Mia: e.g., Alex Lin / Li Ming / Mia
谁打开它，都能认出是我留下的声音。: Whoever opens this, they can recognize it’s my voice.
系统会优先遵循这里选择的语言；切到英文，整页切成英文版（未来版本）。: Generation will follow this language; switching to English renders the entire page in English.
我思想的“参考书”可写影响你的书、电影、人物或信条，未来系统据此对接，才知道“你: List books, films, people or creeds that shape your judgment—so future systems know how you think.
如：康德、马斯克、我从母亲那学到的: e.g., Kant, Musk, a quote from my mother
例如：1. 诚实 2. 不伤人 3. 不投降: e.g., 1. Honesty 2. Do no harm 3. Never surrender
例如：跨越底线即终止交流。不攻击家人。: e.g., Crossing the line stops interaction. Do not attack family.
例如：反思‑行动‑复盘‑反思；写日志，周末复盘，周目标呈现。: e.g., Reflect → Act → Review → Reflect; keep a log, weekly review, show weekly goals.
例如：任何尊重我边界的人；或公司邮箱: e.g., Any being that respects my boundaries / trusted email
例如：姓名、手机号、微信：lmjing123；或公钥片段: e.g., Name: Li Ming, WeChat: lming123; or public‑key fragment
未开通 GPG/IPFS？没关系——先跳过签名/上传，后面再补。: No GPG/IPFS? It’s okay—skip signing/upload now and add later.
